name: songs biblispec addendum appendum
status: A living document of tonal beats.

songs.name: come by yah
lyric: Some sons are crying me Gawd come by yah
Some mas are crying me Gawd come by yah
Some young are dieing me Gawd come by yah

songs.name: take this hammer
lyric: take this hammer and pass it to the captain

songs.name: helpless
lyric: There is a town in north Ontario
With dream comfort memory to spare
And in my mind I still need a place to go
Blue blue windows behind the stars
Big birds flying across the sky
